fields.name: cap
fields.description: The field for the cap record component.

fields.name: typeClass
fields.description: The field for the typeClass record component.

fields.name: contextClass
fields.description: The field for the contextClass record component.

constructors.name: StoredCap
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a StoredCap record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: cap
methods.description: Returns the value of the cap record component.

methods.name: typeClass
methods.description: Returns the value of the typeClass record component.

methods.name: contextClass
methods.description: Returns the value of the contextClass record component.
